title: TRAFFICABLE AREAS
fullText:
When working near traffic areas, traffic management procedures for the installation of screens, barriers and signage shall be employed. Lighting should be installed for safety and protection where lighting levels have been identified as a factor in a risk assessment.
NOTE Traffic areas include vehicular and pedestrian areas.
Preventive action should be taken, when working in a passageway or narrow access area. For example, where a door might be inadvertently opened or closed and propel persons into an energized electrical source, the door should be restrained while work is being undertaken.
